editExpirableItemScreen_input_placeHolde: Please enter the item name (up to 30 characters)
permission_notification_description:
To timely remind you of food expiration times, we need you to grant notification permission.

This will help you:
• Receive advance reminders when food is about to expire
• Get notifications on the day food expires
• Better manage food freshness
permission_exact_alarm_description:
To ensure notifications are delivered on time, we need you to grant exact alarm permission.

This will ensure:
• Notifications are delivered at the exact scheduled time
• Normal reminders even in power-saving mode
• Optimal user experience
permission_welcome_description: To ensure you receive timely food expiration reminders, we need your authorization
permission_feature_warning_desc: Get immediate alerts when food expires
